mapper.select: select f.FAC_CD,f.fac_nm,f.fac_dt,f.fac_cy,f.fac_rct_MTN,f.fac_info,s.fac_run,NVL(FAC_RCT_MTN,f.fac_dt)+f.fac_cy MTN_PLANNED from (select f.fac_cd,f.fac_nm,f.fac_dt,f.fac_cy,i.FAC_RCT_MTN,f.fac_info from FAC f LEFT JOIN ( select FAC_CD, max(FAC_MTN_DT) FAC_RCT_MTN from FAC_INSP group by FAC_CD order by FAC_CD) i ON f.FAC_CD = i.FAC_CD) f LEFT JOIN FAC_STAT s ON f.fac_cd=s.fac_cd
select fac_mtn, fac_cd, fac_rtn, fac_mtn_dt, fac_rslt, fac_act, fac_act_dtl, fac_mgr from fac_INSP order by FAC_MTN_DT
mapper.insert: insert into FAC_INSP ( FAC_MTN, FAC_CD, FAC_RTN, FAC_MTN_DT, FAC_RSLT, FAC_ACT, FAC_ACT_DTL, FAC_MGR) VALUES ( 'MTN'||(select (NVL(numcode,0))+1 from (select MAX(TO_NUMBER(substr(FAC_MTN,4))) as numcode from FAC_INSP)), #{facCd}, #{facRtn}, #{facMtnDt}, #{facRslt}, #{facAct}, #{facActDtl}, #{facMgr} )
mapper.select: select FDM_CD, F.FAC_CD, FAC_NM, FDM_MGR, FDM_STOP, FDM_RUN, D.CFD_CD, FAC_RUN, FAC_INFO, CFD_TITLE, CFD_CONTENT from FAC_DWN_MNG D , FAC_STAT S, FAC F, CM_FAC_DWN_CODE C where D.FAC_CD = S.FAC_CD AND D.FAC_CD = F.FAC_CD AND D.CFD_CD = C.CFD_CD ORDER BY FDM_STOP DESC

SELECT D.FAC_CD, FAC_NM, FDM_CD, FDM_MGR, RCT_STP, FDM_RUN, D.CFD_CD, CFD_TITLE, CFD_CONTENT, FAC_RUN FROM FAC_DWN_MNG D ,( SELECT FAC_CD, MAX(FDM_STOP) RCT_STP FROM FAC_DWN_MNG GROUP BY FAC_CD ) R ,CM_FAC_DWN_CODE C ,FAC_STAT S ,FAC F where D.FAC_CD = R.FAC_CD AND D.FDM_STOP = R.RCT_STP AND D.CFD_CD = C.CFD_CD AND D.FAC_CD = S.FAC_CD AND D.FAC_CD = F.FAC_CD ORDER BY D.FAC_CD
mapper.insert: insert into FAC_DWN_MNG (FDM_CD, FDM_MGR, FDM_STOP, FDM_RUN, FAC_CD, CFD_CD ) VALUES ( 'FDM'||(select max(NVL(numcode,0))+1 from (select MAX (TO_NUMBER(substr(fdm_cd,4))) as numcode from FAC_DWN_MNG)), #{fdmMgr}, #{fdmStop}, NULL, #{facCd}, #{cfdCd} )
